Variant Accumulation¶

Classes to accumulate the variant and case information for a query request.

Contents

  • Variant Accumulation

    • beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator

    • beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator25

    • beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator20

    • beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator15

    • beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator10

    • beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator5

    • beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator0

beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator¶

class beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator[source]¶

The accumulator class declares the factory method accumulate_variant. The accumulator’s subclasses provide the implementation of this method.

accumulate(allele_response)[source]¶

Call method for the accumulation factory method to accumulate information about the AlleleResponseAccumulation object variant.

Parameters

allele_response – An AlleleResponseAccumulation object.

abstract accumulate_variant(allele_response)[source]¶

Abstract method for the accumulation the information about the AlleleResponseAccumulation object variant.

Parameters

allele_response – An AlleleResponseAccumulation object.

beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator25¶

class beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator25[source]¶

Accumulator class for visibility level 25: accumulates information about existence, frequency count and sample count.

accumulate_variant(allele_response)[source]¶

Accumulates the information about the AlleleResponseAccumulation object variant for visibility level 25 (=public).

Parameters

allele_response – An AlleleResponseAccumulation object.

beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator20¶

class beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator20[source]¶

Accumulator class for visibility level 20: accumulates information about existence, frequency count, sample count, internal variant count and variantCount>10.

accumulate_variant(allele_response)[source]¶

Accumulates the information about the AlleleResponseAccumulation object variant for visibility level 20 which changes the internal variant count.

Parameters

allele_response – An AlleleResponseAccumulation object.

beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator15¶

class beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator15[source]¶

Accumulator class for visibility level 15: accumulates information about existence, frequency count, sample count, allele count and variantCount>10.

accumulate_variant(allele_response)[source]¶

Accumulates the information about the AlleleResponseAccumulation object variant for visibility level 15 which changes the variant count.

Parameters

allele_response – An AlleleResponseAccumulation object.

beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator10¶

class beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator10[source]¶

Accumulator class for visibility level 10: accumulates information about existence, frequency count, sample count, variantCount>10, allele count and coarse phenotype.

accumulate_variant(allele_response)[source]¶

Accumulates the information about the AlleleResponseAccumulation object variant for visibility level 10 which changes the coarse phenotype.

Parameters

allele_response – An AlleleResponseAccumulation object.

beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator5¶

class beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator5[source]¶

Accumulator class for visibility level 5: accumulates information about existence, frequency count, sample count, variantCount>10, allele count and phenotype.

accumulate_variant(allele_response)[source]¶

Accumulates the information about the AlleleResponseAccumulation object variant for visibility level 5 which changes the phenotype.

Parameters

allele_response – An AlleleResponseAccumulation object.

beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator0¶

class beacon.variant_accumulation.VariantAccumulator0[source]¶

Accumulator class for visibility level 0: accumulates information about existence, frequency count, sample count, variantCount>10, allele count, phenotype and case index.

accumulate_variant(allele_response)[source]¶

Accumulates the information about the AlleleResponseAccumulation object variant for visibility level 0 which changes the case index.

Parameters

allele_response – An AlleleResponseAccumulation object.
